title: Michael Gove – 2018 Speech to Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Michael Gove, the Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, at the Conservative Party Conference held in Birmingham on 1 October 2018.
